name: Van and colors
description:
You are driving a the car, which automatically fires the colored balls. Car changes color randomly over the time.

The goal is to collect balls of the same color as the car to get more Fuel. It also encrease car performance and Score.  Ball have a few seconds before it's become active, but never disappear by itself.

By collecting wrong colors, the Fuel and Score are lost.

Game is over when there is no Fuel left.

CONTROLS: WSAD or Arrows
